content: हरित् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [हृ-इति] {@--1@} Green, green ish. {@--2@} Yellow, yellowish. {@--3@} Greenish-yellow. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} The green or yellow colour. {@--2@} A horse of the sun, a bay horse; सत्यमतीत्य हरितो हरींश्च वर्तते वाजिनः <ls>Ś. 1.</ls>; दिशो हरिद्भिर्हरितामिवेश्वरः <ls>R. 3. 30</ls>, <ls>Ku. 2. 43.</ls> {@--3@} A swift horse. {@--4@} A lion. {@--5@} The sun {@--6@} Viṣṇu. {@--7@} The kidneybean. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Grass. {@--2@} A quarter, region. {@--3@} A quarter or point of the compass; <ls>R. 3. 30.</ls> {@--4@} Turmeric (usually {%<ab>f.</ab>%} only in the last {3} senses).
